[CENTER][CENTER][CENTER][CENTER]FEATURES : * Good switches *Fight pits * All Chaotic Wepons * Working Slayer * Full SoulSplit. * Full Pking System * Npc Combat * Fixed Noclipping * New teleports * Fixed Server lagg * Added Anti-Lag System * Fixed Char Glitches. * New Pvp Loots. * Added New Pvp Armours * Added New Royal Crown * Added New Arcane Streamer * Added New Staff of light models * Added New Soul Wars Cape * Added New DONATOR System. * Fully Working Mage system * Added ::item Command all items are free except Pvp items * Added ::setlevel * Added All Chaotic Stats * working Fixed Chaotic Staff * Added Anti-Lag System * Added Anti-Flood System * Added More Donator Commands * Added Donator Zone * 100% working Tormented-demon still in * Added New Contest Updates * No More Bank glitches. * Added Prayer Animations + Gfx’s * Pvp items * Vengance 100% * 100% Hybriding * 100% 1v1 * Magebank * Clan Wars 100% SAFE * Much pvp areas * 100% Bounty hunter with teleports * 5+ Working skills, more to be added! * Alot of players on the right moments * Added New Hp bars * Soul Split GFX * Soul Split Healing * Turmoil REAL GFX & Stat Boosts
